89.movie_name: South Park: Bigger, Longer and Uncut (1999)
89.movie_plot: When Cartman and his friends go see an R rated movie, they start swearing and their parents think that Canada is to blame.

260.movie_plot: A starship crew goes to investigate the silence of a planet's colony only to find two survivors and a deadly secret that one of them has.

218.movie_plot: Kermit and his newfound friends trek across America to find success in Hollywood, but a frog legs merchant is after Kermit.

242.movie_plot: Men seeking relief from the Black Death, guided by a boy's vision, dig a tunnel from 14th century England to 20th century New Zealand.

71.movie_plot: When a childless couple of an ex-con and an ex-cop decide to help themselves to one of another family's quintuplets, their lives become more complicated than they anticipated.

240.movie_plot: In San Francisco, a group of people discover the human race is being replaced one by one, with clones devoid of emotion.

116.movie_plot: A professional hitman and hitwoman fall in love.

188.movie_plot: The IMF is shut down when it's implicated in the bombing of the Kremlin, causing Ethan Hunt and his new team to go rogue to clear their organization's name.

166.movie_plot: As Earth is invaded by alien tripod fighting machines, one family fights for survival.

272.movie_plot: Earth is invaded by Martians with unbeatable weapons and a cruel sense of humor.
